robot

Interface IDDRobot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorLineSensorDDRobot, LineSensorDDRobot, SimpleDDRobot

    public interface IDDRobot
    Simulates the physical behavior of a differential drive robot in a simulated environment
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

                   double omega,
                   double dt)
        Update the robot position
        Parameters:
        v: - linear velocity of the robot
        omega: - angular velocity of the robot
        dt: - time intervall
